accessAnalysisData.description-detail: Navigates to the analysis section and sets the data view to display statistics from the past 30 days.

addNewMedicine.description-detail: Adds a new medicine named "Claritin" to the user\'s medicine list in the app.

updateOverviewDisplayEvents.description-detail: Navigates app settings to update the overview display events timeframe to the past 7 days.

clearEvents.description-detail: Clears all stored event data from the app after user confirmation.
